name: Moltres
flavorText: The flames on this legendary Pokémon's wings burn so brightly that they can make night seem like day.

attacks.name: Hyper Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Moltres. If tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Moltres. If you can't discard Energy cards, this attack does nothing.
